speaker: Patient
text: So, I was just wondering if, um, the losartan is enough to keep my blood pressure in check, or if there's, uh, something else I should be doing?

speaker: Clinician
text: Well, your last few readings have been pretty stable, which is a good sign. But, um, we should keep monitoring it closely. Are you still checking it at home regularly?

speaker: Patient
text: Yeah, I try to do it every morning. Sometimes I forget, but mostly I'm on top of it. It's just, you know, with work and everything, it gets a bit hectic.

speaker: Clinician
text: I understand. It's important to keep that routine. And, uh, about the atorvastatin, have you had any muscle aches or anything unusual since we last talked?

speaker: Patient
text: No, not really. I mean, sometimes I feel a bit tired, but I think that's more from work stress than anything else.

speaker: Clinician
text: Okay, that's good to hear. Just keep an eye on it, and if anything changes, let me know. And, uh, about your diet and exercise, are you managing to keep up with that?
